result.execSummary:
The defendant Krystal D. Hinsa was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/FT schooling or any combincation thereof, or any time she does not meet that requirement defendant must complete 10 hours community service per week.
No contact with Kohl's Rib Mt Wausau.

Any assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by PO.
DNA sample w/ surcharge.
Probation to be transferred to Vilas County.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Cheree
Case called: 10:04am
State appears by ADA C.Minder.  Def appears in person/pro se 
VRCW

PLEA:
Ct. 1>>NO CONTEST

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/held; 1 year probation.
CONDITIONS: Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; N/C with Kohls in Rib Mountain/Wausau; GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/FT schooling or any combination thereof, or any time she does not meet that requirement, defendant must perform 10 hours of C.S./week; CC; DNA sample and surcharge.

>>Probation to be transferred to Vilas County

Adj: 10:15am

Plea hearing at 03-18-2016 10:00 am.
Final pre-trial at 04-14-2016 10:00 am.
Jury Trial at 05-11-2016 08:15 am.

No contact with victim(s):  Kohls Dept Store in Wausau.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.    Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept.
